mapper.update:
update standardhalf
ScheduleID = #{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CompanyID = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FirstHomeWin = #{firsthomewin,jdbcType=REAL},
FirstStandoff = #{firststandoff,jdbcType=REAL},
FirstGuestWin = #{firstguestwin,jdbcType=REAL},
HomeWin = #{homewin,jdbcType=REAL},
Standoff = #{standoff,jdbcType=REAL},
GuestWin = #{guestwin,jdbcType=REAL},
ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HomeWin_R = #{homewinR,jdbcType=REAL},
Standoff_R = #{standoffR,jdbcType=REAL},
GuestWin_R = #{guestwinR,jdbcType=REAL},
where OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update standardhalf set ScheduleID = #{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CompanyID = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FirstHomeWin = #{firsthomewin,jdbcType=REAL}, FirstStandoff = #{firststandoff,jdbcType=REAL}, FirstGuestWin = #{firstguestwin,jdbcType=REAL}, HomeWin = #{homewin,jdbcType=REAL}, Standoff = #{standoff,jdbcType=REAL}, GuestWin = #{guestwin,jdbcType=REAL}, ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HomeWin_R = #{homewinR,jdbcType=REAL}, Standoff_R = #{standoffR,jdbcType=REAL}, GuestWin_R = #{guestwinR,jdbcType=REAL}, where OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from standardhalf where ScheduleID = #{mid} and CompanyID = #{cpy} order by ModifyTime desc limit 1
